thread.title: Hannity: The Press Has ‘Declared War on President Trump’ and the People Behind Him
thread.title_full: Hannity: The Press Has ‘Declared War on President Trump’ and the People Behind Him

author: Josh Feldman
title: Hannity: The Press Has ‘Declared War on President Trump’ and the People Behind Him
text:
Hannity: The Press Has ‘Declared War on President Trump’ and the People Behind Him by Josh Feldman | 10:39   
Sean Hannity opened his program tonight going after the media once again, backing up President Trump ‘s recent attacks on the press for bias and dishonesty. 
He said not only is the press at war with the president, but they’re also at war with the American people who put him in office. 
Hannity recalled coverage of Barack Obama ‘s past vs Trump’s, along with what WikiLeaks revealed about certain news organizations, and said that despite everything that has happened in the past few months, the mainstream media has learned nothing: 
“They are collectively… at war with the president, because their little egos are bruised and they have been exposed. And they’re waging this battle by focusing in on superfluous non-important issues, citing unnamed sources, and the press has called this president every name in the book.” 
Watch above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
